nodes.text: A hotel operated business in Coruscant's Southern Underground district during the Galactic Civil War. In the year 3.5 ABY, Luke Skywalker, Dash Rendar, Lando Calrissian, and Chewbacca once stayed at the hotel while plotting a rescue mission of Princess Leia Organa from the clutches of Dark Prince Xizor and the Black Sun crime syndicate.
